Ujian Nasional 2020 Tetap Digelar, Fungsi Penentu Kelulusan Dikaji
06 Nov 2019, 09:34 by Dhita Seftiawan
JAKARTA, (PR).- Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Nadiem Anwar Makarim mengaku sedang mengkaji ulang bentuk penyelenggaraan dan fungsi Ujian Nasional (UN). Kendati demikian, khusus tahun depan, UN masih tetap akan digelar dan berbasis komputer.
Pengkajian termasuk membahas apakah UN akan kembali berfungsi sebagai penentu kelulusan atau tidak.Ia mengatakan, pengkajian UN dilakukan dengan para guru dari beragam organisasi profesi guru, pakar pendidikan dan pemangku kepentingan di Kemendikbud. Komunitas pendidikan dan perwakilan masyarakat juga ikut memberi masukan kepada Nadiem. Ia membentuk tim khusus untuk mengkaji UN dan zonasi yang tahun depan akan disempurnakan."Fungsi dan penyelenggaraan UN sama seperti zonasi, sedang kami kaji. Pendapat dari para guru dan orang tua mengenai UN sedang kami kaji," kata Nadiem di Kantor Kemendikbud, Jakarta, Rabu 6 November 2019.Mantan Mendikbud Muhadjir Effendy saat masa tugasnya akan berakhir sempat mengeluarkan wacana mengembalikan fungsi UN. Yakni, sebagai penentu kelulusan. Pasalnya, dalam 3 tahun terakhir, fungsi UN hanya untuk memetakan mutu sekolah. Muhadjir menegaskan, UN bisa menjadi penentu kelulusan dengan catatan penyelenggaraannya sudah semua berbasis komputer. "Saya belum mengambil keputusan apa-apa," kata Nadiem menyikapi wacana yang disebutkan Muhadjir.
Fungsi Ujian Nasional 
Pada tahun lalu, Kemendikbud memperluas fungsi Ujian Nasional yang setiap tahun diselenggarakan pada jenjang SMP/SMA/SMK sederajat. Kendati sudah tak berfungsi sebagai penentu kelulusan, UN dipakai untuk memetakan beragam faktor yang mempengaruhi kualitas siswa melalui mekanisme pengisian angket.Kepala Badan Penelitian dan Pengembangan  Kemendikbud Totok Suprayitno mengatakan, 91% pelaksanaan UN tahun lalu berbasis komputer. Menurut dia, UN tidak hanya penting untuk menilai aspek kognitif siswa. Tetapi juga aspek nonkognitif yang banyak dipengaruhi lingkungan keluarga.“Melalui angket siswa diharapkan informasi tersebut akan memberikan analisa yang komprehensif mengenai faktor-faktor yang mempengaruhi capaian siswa di luar materi ujian. Background bagaimana kita dapat mengetahui kesiapan dan kemampuan siswa pada saat UN bisa ditelusuri antara lain dengan melihat kemampuan ekonomi keluarga siswa tersebut,” ujar Totok.Ia mengatakan, hasil UN dapat dijadikan rujukan bagi dinas pendidikan dan pemerintah daerah untuk meningkatkan kompetensi guru per mata pelajaran. Dengan demikian, para guru tidak akan lagi dilatih secara umum.“Kalau ternyata di kota A nilai UN mata pelajaran matematika jelek, ya gurunya yang dilatih adalah guru mata pelajaran tersebut. Siswa akan mengisi angket setelah menyelesaikan UN. Ada 5 jenis angket, dan setiap siswa hanya mengerjakan satu jenis angket saja,” katanya.Penyelenggaraan UN tahun lalu diikuti oleh 8.259.581 siswa dari 103.000 satuan pendidikan. Sebanyak 7.507.116 UN berbasis komputer dan sisanya melaksanakan UN berbasis kerta pensil. Totok menyatakan, penyelenggaraan UNBK menaikan indeks integritas sekolah.***

2020 National Examination Still Held, Determination Function Graduated
Nov 6, 2019, 09:34 by Dhita Seftiawan
JAKARTA, (PR) .- Minister of Education and Culture Nadiem Anwar Makarim claimed to be reviewing the form and implementation of the National Examination (UN). Nevertheless, specifically next year, the UN will still be held and based on computers.
The assessment includes discussing whether the UN will return to function as a determinant of graduation or not. He said, the UN examination was carried out with teachers from various teacher professional organizations, education experts and stakeholders in the Ministry of Education and Culture. The education community and community representatives also provided input to Nadiem. He formed a special team to study the UN and zoning which will be refined next year. "The function and implementation of the UN are the same as zoning, we are reviewing. The opinions of teachers and parents about the UN are being examined," Nadiem said at the Office of the Ministry of Education and Culture, Jakarta, Wednesday 6 November 2019. Former Minister of Education and Culture Muhadjir Effendy when his term of office was about to end had a chance to issue a discourse to restore the UN function. Namely, as a determinant of graduation. Because, in the last 3 years, the function of the UN is only to map the quality of schools. Muhadjir emphasized that the UN could be the determinant of graduation with the notes that the implementation was all computer based. "I haven't made any decisions yet," Nadiem said in response to the discourse mentioned by Muhadjir.
National Examination Function
Last year, the Ministry of Education and Culture expanded the function of the National Examination which is held annually at the level of junior high / high school / vocational school. Even though it is no longer functioning as a determinant of graduation, the UN is used to map various factors that affect the quality of students through the questionnaire filling mechanism. Head of the Ministry of Research and Development of the Ministry of Education and Culture Totok Suprayitno said, 91% of last year's national exams were computer based. According to him, the UN is not only important to assess the cognitive aspects of students. But it is also the noncognitive aspect that is much influenced by the family environment. "It is hoped that through the student questionnaire the information will provide a comprehensive analysis of the factors that affect student achievement outside the exam material. The background on how we can find out the readiness and ability of students when the national examination can be traced, among others, is by looking at the economic capabilities of the student's family, "said Totok. Thus, the teachers will no longer be trained in general. "If it turns out that in city A the National Examination score for mathematics subjects is poor, the teacher trained is the subject teacher. Students will fill out a questionnaire after completing the national examination. There are 5 types of questionnaires, and each student only works on one type of questionnaire, "he said. The implementation of the UN last year was followed by 8,259,581 students from 103,000 education units. A total of 7.507,116 computer-based national exams and the remainder carried out pencil-based national exams. Totok said, the implementation of UNBK raised the school integrity index. ***
